wikitext.*:
'''The Adventures of Frodo''' is a selected reading by [[Michael Hordern]] from [[The Lord of the Rings]] in two parts produced for [[BBC|BBC School Radio]] and released on audio cassette in [[1987]].<ref>[[Wayne G. Hammond]], ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: A Descriptive Bibliography]]'', p. 138</ref> Not much is known about the specifics of this audio recording other than the titles of the two parts.

# One Ring to Rule Them All
# An Enemy among the Friends
